(OOC: Ya, Yanshosh and Megan!!!  CHEERS!!  CHEERS!!  And no, Yanshosh, my, I
mean, oh whatever, my secret aint slipping out so easily!)

   ::Dark Lavacons::

       Astral smiles as he recieves the coordinates.

       "Let's go, gang, and get ready for some destruction later!" He yelled
to the others.

        They all flew off to the new location for base.  After flying for a
while, halfway in turbo speed, they were close enough to the new location to
walk on their two feet.  Or in Fenox's case, all fours.

         Fenox landed and transformed into flaming cheetah mode.  He ran at
his amazing speed, and was far ahead of the others.

        "Oh you wanna race, eh punk?!" Astral shouted.

        He transformed into lavadactyl mode, and flew off flapping at full
speed towards Fenox, and the new base.

        Starlight transformed to flame wasp mode, and buzzed off towards the
two.

        Griplash couldn't slither very fast in snake mode, but when it came
to running in robot mode, he was almost unmatchable.  He ran off after the
others.

        Now the only one who hadn't joined in was Recklessa.

        "Suckers!!" She screamed at them, as they disappeared into the
distance.

     She snickered.

      Recklessa flew up into the air with her thrusters, and shot straight
after them at the speed of a bullet.  Soon, she was ahead.

       "Na na na na na na!" She taunted them, as she continued to fly.

         "I'll show you!!!" Astral shouted.

          Astral transformed into robot mode in mid-air, and blasted off
with his thrusters.

        He was now ahead of all of them.

        Recklessa growled as he passed her.

        "Creep!" She said.  Recklessa pulled out her gatling guns, and fired
them straight ahead at Astral, still flying.

         "You wanna turn this into a destruction derby-race?  So be it!!!"
Astral shouted back.

        He pulled out his rocket launcher, and fired back at Recklessa.

        Fenox and Starlight were now ahead, constantly going ahead of
eachother.

        Fenox leaped on top of Starlight, and brought her down.  He
continued running off then.

        Griplash eventually caught up.  He jumped in the air, and got hold
of Recklessa's leg.

       He climbed up onto her back, and started steering her.  They were so
caught in this race and everything that they didn't see the base location
ahead.

        "Stop!!!!!!" Astral said, and fired a blast from his rocket
launcher.

      They all stopped.

      "We're here!" He said.

       They all stopped there, and waited for everybody to arrive.
